pages.about: About Us - FinancialLiteracy FinancialLiteracy Home About Us News Contact Us About us Think of the world's most iconic and successful brands. They are easily recognizable, findable, and impactful. That's not by accident - visibility and trust are the superpowers of exceptional design.Intuition and strategy integrate the research methodology that we also apply to traditional media. The perfect    agency for your digital studio. We love what we do and create partnerships with our clients to ensure their digital transformation is positioned for long-term success.We believe that the human dimensions essential to start any successful project and that this is where splendid emotional relationships between the company and people are born. Awards 14 Education Excellence 3 Developer Award 1 Honorable Mention 7 Mobile Exelence 3 Community Impact Awards 34 Financial Literacy Leader 10 UI Design Award 4 Innovation Design Award 7 Website of the Day 13 Our Team Amit Sharma Priya Singh Ravi Kumar Personalized Financial Planning for Every Need Custom Financial Education Services At FinancialLiteracy, we understand that every individual's financial journey is unique. That's why we offer custom financial education services tailored to your specific needs. Whether you're planning for retirement, managing debt, or looking to invest wisely, our team will work closely with you to create a comprehensive financial plan that reflects your goals and aspirations. From the initial consultation to the final implementation, we handle all the details so you can focus on achieving your financial objectives. Our experienced team provides expert guidance, resource management, and ongoing support to ensure that your financial plan is executed flawlessly. With deep knowledge of the financial industry, we offer a wide range of services, including budgeting assistance, investment planning, retirement strategies, and debt management. Our goal is to provide personalized solutions that meet your needs and exceed your expectations. If you're looking for a financial education partner who can help you turn your financial goals into reality, contact us today. Our dedicated team will be happy to discuss your requirements and create a custom package that addresses your specific needs. Let's work together Stay inTouch FinancialLiteracy Sitemap Home About Us News Contact Us Info Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Contact financial-literacy@gmail.com +91-926-2039483 Pocket B-11 Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 Copyright © FinancialLiteracy
pages.index: FinancialLiteracy - Empower Your Financial Future FinancialLiteracy Home About Us News Contact Us “Financial literacy is the cornerstone of financial independence.” At FinancialLiteracy, we believe that understanding personal finance is essential for everyone. Our mission is to provide comprehensive and accessible financial education to help you make informed decisions about your money. At FinancialLiteracy, we are dedicated to helping individuals and families gain control over their financial future. Our mission is to provide accessible and comprehensive financial education that empowers you to make informed decisions and achieve your financial goals. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - FinancialLiteracy FinancialLiteracy Home About Us News Contact Us Privacy Policy Effective Date: 2024-07-01 Welcome to FinancialLiteracy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use and protect it, and your rights regarding your personal data. 1. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide. 2. How We Use Your Information Your information is used to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations. 3. Data Sharing and Disclosure We do not share your personal information with third parties except to comply with legal requirements or with your consent. 4. Security of Your Information We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. 5. Your Data Protection Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your data and request data portability. 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. 7. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. 8. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. 10. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: Phone: +91-926-2039483 Email: financial-literacy@gmail.com Address: Pocket B-11 Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 FinancialLiteracy Sitemap Home About Us News Contact Us Info Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Contact financial-literacy@gmail.com +91-926-2039483 Pocket B-11 Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 Copyright © FinancialLiteracy
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - FinancialLiteracy FinancialLiteracy Home About Us News Contact Us Terms and Conditions Effective Date: 2024-07-01 Welcome to FinancialLiteracy. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. 1. Acceptance of Terms By using our services, you accept and agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our website. 2. Use of the Website You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the website. 3. User Accounts You may need to create an account to access certain features of our website. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. 4. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of FinancialLiteracy and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. 5. Prohibited Conduct You agree not to use our website for any unlawful purpose, to transmit harmful code, or to engage in any conduct that could damage, disable, or impair our website. 6. Limitation of Liability FinancialLiteracy will not be liable for any damages arising from your use of our website or your inability to use the website. 7. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold FinancialLiteracy harmless from any claims, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising out of your use of our website. 8. Modifications to the Website We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the website or any part of it without notice. 9. Governing Law These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in New Delhi for any disputes. 10. Termination We may terminate or suspend your access to our website without prior notice or liability for any reason, including if you breach these terms. 11. Disclaimer Our website and its content are provided "as is" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. 12. Privacy Policy Your use of our website is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which you can review on the Privacy Policy page. 13. Changes to the Terms We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. 14. Contact Information If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us: Phone: +91-926-2039483 Email: financial-literacy@gmail.com Address: Pocket B-11 Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 FinancialLiteracy Sitemap Home About Us News Contact Us Info Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Contact financial-literacy@gmail.com +91-926-2039483 Pocket B-11 Vasant Kunj, New Delhi, Delhi 110070 Copyright © FinancialLiteracy
